lyrics.name: Love Me Again
lyrics.lyrics:
Know I've done wrong,
 left your heart torn Is that what devils do?
 Took you so low, where only fools go I shook the angel in you
 Now I'm rising from the ground Rising up to you
Filled with all the strength I found
There's nothing I can't do
I need to know now, know now
Can you love me again?
I need to know now, know now
Can you love me again?
I need to know now, know now
Can you love me again?
I need to know now, know now
Can you love me again?
Can you love me again?
It's unforgivable
I stole and burnt your soul
Is that what demons do?
They rule the worst of me
Destroy everything
They bring down angels like you
Now I'm rising from the ground
Rising up to you
Filled with all the strength I found
There's nothing I can't do
I need to know now, know now
Can you love me again?
I need to know now, know now
Can you love me again?
Can you love me again?
Oh, I told you once again
I can't do this again, do this again, oh
I told you once again
I can't do this again, do this again, oh no
I need to know now, know now
Can you love me again?
I need to know now, know now
Can you love me again?
I need to know now, know now
Can you love me again (Oh, oh)
Can you love me again?
Can you love me again?
Can you love me again?

lyrics.name: Another Love
lyrics.lyrics:
I wanna take you somewhere so you know I care
But it's so cold and I don't know where
I brought you daffodils in a pretty string
But they won't flower like they did last spring
And I wanna kiss you, make you feel alright
I'm just so tired to share my nights
I wanna cry and I wanna love
But all my tears have been used up
On another love, another love
All my tears have been used up
On another love, another love
All my tears have been used up
On another love, another love
All my tears have been used up, up
And if somebody hurts you, I wanna fight
But my hand's been broken one too many times
So I'll use my voice, I'll be so fucking rude
Words, they always win, but I know I'll lose
And I'd sing a song that'd be just ours
But I sang 'em all to another heart
And I wanna cry, I wanna learn to love
But all my tears have been used up
On another love, another love
All my tears have been used up
On another love, another love
All my tears have been used up
On another love, another love
All my tears have been used up, up
Oh, need a love, now
My heart is thinking of
I wanna sing a song that'd be just ours
But I sang 'em all to another heart
And I wanna cry, I wanna fall in love
But all my tears have been used up
On another love, another love
All my tears have been used up
On another love, another love
All my tears have been used up
On another love, another love
All my tears have been used up, up

lyrics.lyrics:
You were the shadow to my light
Did you feel us?
Another star
You fade away
Afraid our aim is out of sight
Wanna see us
Alight
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Was it all in my fantasy?
Where are you now?
Were you only imaginary?
Where are you now?
Atlantis
Under the sea
Under the sea
Where are you now?
Another dream
The monster's running wild inside of me
I'm faded
I'm faded
So lost
I'm faded
I'm faded
So lost
I'm faded
These shallow waters, never met
What I needed
I'm letting go
A deeper dive
Eternal silence of the sea
I'm breathing
Alive
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Under the bright but faded lights
You set my heart on fire
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Where are you now?
Atlantis
Under the sea
Under the sea
Where are you now?
Another dream
The monster's running wild inside of me
I'm faded
I'm faded
So lost
I'm faded
I'm faded
So lost
I'm faded

lyrics.name: Bad Liar
lyrics.lyrics:
Oh, hush, my dear, it's been a difficult year
And terrors don't prey on
Innocent victims
Trust me, darling, trust me darling
It's been a loveless year
I'm a man of three fears
Integrity, faith, and
Crocodile tears
Trust me, darling, trust me, darling
So look me in the eyes
Tell me what you see
Perfect paradise
Tearing at the seams
I wish I could escape
I don't wanna fake it
Wish I could erase it
Make your heart believe
But I'm a bad liar, bad liar
Now you know, now you know
I'm a bad liar, bad liar
Now you know, you're free to go (go)
Did all my dreams never mean one thing
Does happiness lie in a diamond ring?
Oh, I've been asking for (trust me, darling, trust me, darling)
Oh, I've been asking for problems, problems, problems
I wage my war, on the world inside
I take my gun to the enemy's side
Oh, I've been asking for (trust me, darling, trust me, darling)
Oh, I've been asking for problems, problems, problems
So look me in the eyes
Tell me what you see
Perfect paradise
Tearing at the seams
I wish I could escape
I don't wanna fake it
Wish I could erase it
Make your heart believe
But I'm a bad liar, bad liar
Now you know, now you know
I'm a bad liar, bad liar
Now you know, you're free to go (go)
I can't breathe, I can't be
I can't be what you want me to be
Believe me, this one time, believe me
I'm a bad liar, bad liar
Now you know, now you know
I'm a bad liar, bad liar
Now you know, you're free to go (go)
Please believe me
Please believe me
I-I-I, sai-sai-said, sai-sai-said
I-I-I, hey, yeah, yeah
Oh, baby
Oh, baby
Trust me, darling, trust me, darling
Trust me, darling, trust me, darling
Trust me, darling, trust me, darling

lyrics.name: Death Bed
lyrics.lyrics:
To be young and in love in New York City
To not know who I am but still know that I'm good long as you're here with me
To be drunk and in love in New York City
Midnight into morning coffee, burning through the hours talking
Damn...
I like me better when I'm with you
I like me better when I'm with you
I knew from the first time, I'd stay for a long time 'cause

I don't know what it is but I got that feeling

Damn...

lyrics.lyrics:
Hate me, hate me, still tryna replace me

I'm at one, and I've been quiet for too long

lyrics.name: Solo
lyrics.lyrics:
You speak to me
And in your words I hear a melody
But in the twilight, it's so hard to see
What's wrong for me
I can't resist
Until you give the truth a little twist
As if you're gonna get away with this
You're not sorry
I can't believe I fell for this
I fell through the hole
Down at the bottom of your soul
Didn't think you could go so low
Look at what you've done
You're losing me
Here's what you've won
Got me planning to go
Solo, solo, solo, solo
I'm going solo, solo, solo, solo
Boy, you're such a lost cause
Now your name is crossed off
How you gonna fix this?
You can't even fix yourself
It was good on the surface
Faked it perfect
You're a lost cause
Now I'm gonna fix me
I'm gonna take back my sanity
Give me your shirt
Take back your memories
Just go ahead and take 'em back

'Cause you never gave me love
I wish you would've hurt me harder than I hurt you
I wish you would've waited for me, but you always do
I've been on my own for long enough
Maybe you can show me how to love, maybe
I'm going solo, solo, solo, solo
I'm going solo, solo, solo, solo
Solo, solo, solo, solo
I'm going solo, solo, solo, solo
I'm going solo, solo, solo, solo

lyrics.name: Shape of You
lyrics.lyrics:
The club isn't the best place to find a lover
So the bar is where I go (mm-mm)
Me and my friends at the table doing shots
Drinking fast, and then we talk slow (mm-mm)
You come over and start up a conversation with just me
And trust me, I'll give it a chance now (mm-mm)
Take my hand, stop, put 'Van the Man' on the jukebox
And then we start to dance
And now I'm singing like
Girl, you know I want your love
Your love was handmade for somebody like me
Come on now, follow my lead
I may be crazy, don't mind me
Say, 'Boy, let's not talk too much
Grab on my waist and put that body on me'
Come on now, follow my lead
Come, come on now, follow my lead
(Mm-mm)
I'm in love with the shape of you
We push and pull like a magnet do
Although my heart is falling too
I'm in love with your body
Last night you were in my room
And now my bed sheets smell like you
Every day discovering something brand new

Fill up your bag, and I fill up a plate (mm-mm)
We talk for hours and hours about the sweet and the sour
And how your family is doing okay (mm-mm)
And leave and get in a taxi, then kiss in the back seat
Tell the driver make the radio play
And I'm singing like

lyrics.lyrics:
Yeah, breakfast at Tiffany's and bottles of bubbles
Girls with tattoos who like getting in trouble
Lashes and diamonds, ATM machines
Buy myself all of my favorite things (Yeah)

En nenjam nilaiyindriyaa?..

Angae tholai dhoorathil saaral
Mazhai kanden naan pakkam
Varumbodhu sirai kambiyaa?…

Thavarena paartha kan indru
Kalai seiyudhae!…

Tharisena paartha megengal
Kadal peiyudhay!

Kangal kaaranam thedudhae
Unnai vandhu serudhae…..

Bodhai kanamae kanamae
Pogaadhiru nee!
Bodhai kanamae kanamae
Podhaadhiru nee!

Bodhai kanamae kanamae
Vaazhvaai iru nee!
Bodhai kanamae siragaagidu nee!

Nijamae nijamae..
Neengadhiru nee!
Thaenin dhinamae dhinamae
Thengaadhiru nee!
Naalai inimel analaai
Melae vizhundhaal
Bodhai kanamae kudaiyaai iru nee!

Thodaadha paadhaiyoo?..
Kai veesum aasaiyoo?…

Niraivadhu en oodaiyo?..
Nigazhvadhu yaarin kadhaiyoo?..
Enakenna neenda kilaiyil
Kuyil serudhoo?
Maragadha pon velaiyoo?..
Manadhinil yaazhin mazhaiyo?..

Hum tere bin ab reh nahi sakte

Kyunki tum hi ho, ab tum hi ho

Chain bhi, mera dard bhi
Meri aashiqi, ab tum hi ho

Kyunki tum hi ho, ab tum hi ho
Zindagi ab tum hi ho
Chain bhi, mera dard bhi
Meri aashiqi, ab tum hi ho

lyrics.name: Yedho Ondru
lyrics.lyrics:
Aetho ondru aetho ondru unnai ketpen
Illai endraal illai endraal uyir thurapen
Un paatham nadakka naan pookkal viripen
Un thegam muzhukka thangathaal pathipen

Ullaagi ullaagi laagi….
ullaagi ullaagi laagi
Oru aasai manathukkul pothum
Athai mattum nee thanthaal pothum

Aetho aetho aetho ondru unnai ketpen
Illai illai illai endraal uyir thurapen

Oho ..ho…ho..ho…ho…hoo..hoo
Oho…ho..ho..ho..ho..hoo..hoo
Oho …oho..ho..ho…oho…oho

Nalla manam un pol kidaiyaathu
Nandri solla vaarthai yenakethu
Oru thaai nee un sei naan
Intha uravukku pirivethu

Thaai madiyil sei thaan varalaama
Thalli nindru thunbam tharalaama
Unnai konja manam kenja ennai thaniyae vidalaama

Kuzhanthayum kumari yendraayachae
Konjidum paruvamum poyaachae
Manam pola magal vaazha nee vaazhthum thaai aachae

Ohooo…hooo

Aetho aetho aetho ondru unnai ketpen
Illai illai illai endraal uyir thurapen
Un paatham nadakka naan pookkal viripen
Un thegam muzhukka thangathaal pathipen
Ullaagi ullaagi laagi …. ullaagi ullaagi laagi

Vennilavai poovaai vaippenae

Vaanavillai udaiyaai thaippenae
Unakaaga yethum seiven nee yenakkenna seivaayo

Intha oru jenmam pothaathu
Ezhu jenmam eduthum theeraathu
Antha theivam unaikaaka thinam thozhuven thavaraathu

Enna naan ketpen theriyaatha
Innumum en manam puriyaatha
Ada raama ivan paadu intha penmai ariyaatha…

Ahaaaa…aaaa

Aetho aetho aetho ondru unnai ketpen
Illai illai illai endraal uyir thurapen
Un paatham nadakka naan pookkal viripen
Un thegam muzhukka thangathaal pathipen

Aval ulagha azhagiyae
Nenjil vizhuntha aruviyae
Aval ulagha azhagiyae
Nenjil vizhuntha aruviyae

Andha neela vizhiyilae
Nenjam neendha thudiththathae

Or verillamal neer illamal
Kan irandil kaadhal poothathae
Or yedillamal yezhuthillamal
Padal ondru parvai varthathae

Aval ulagha azhagiyae
Nenjil vizhuntha aruviyae..yae yae..
Aval ulagha azhagiyae
Nenjil vizhuntha aruviyae

Andha neela vizhiyilae
Nenjam neendha thudiththathae

…………………………..

Kanni pennai kaiyilae
Violin pola yendhiyae
Vil illamal viralgalalae meettuven
Inba ragam enna vendru kattuven

Suda suda
Sugangalai ….kodukkalam
En kaadhal dhevadhai
Thoda thoda
Sirippinaal… thelikkalam
En meedhu poo mazhai
Engeyo ennangal
Or oorvalam poga
Kan konda ullangal
Or oviyam aaga
Anandham anandhamae…hey

Aval ulagha azhagiyae
Nenjil vizhuntha aruviyae
Andha neela vizhiyilae
Nenjam neendha thudiththathae

Romeyovin juliet
Dhevadhasin parvathi
Rendu perum ondru serntha mathri
Thondruvalae nan virumbum kaadhali

Avaladhu azhagellam
Ezhuthida or bhashai illaiyae
Avalai nan arintha pin
Uyirin mel or asai illaiyae

Poo vaazhai kondadum

Sandhosham kondadum
En kaadhalai parthu

lyrics.name: Eppo Nee
lyrics.lyrics:
Eppo nee enna paapa
Eppo en pecha keppa
Eppo naan pesa, keta payyaa
Eppo da kovam koraiyum
Eppo da paasam theriyum
Eppo naan pesa, keta payyaa

Eppo nee enna paapa
Eppo en pecha keppa
Eppo naan pesa, keta payyaa
Eppo da kovam koraiyum
Eppo da paasam theriyum
Eppo naan pesa, keta payyaa
Nizhalaga unthan pinnal nadamaaduren
Nijamaga unthan munnal thadumaaruren
Oruu sellaga unthan munnae vaal aaturen
On seyalai elam thuram nindru paaraturen
Ennai oru murai neeyum thirumbi paarpaaiyaa?

Ohooo ohoooo ohoooo...

Kannai katikondu unpinal
Kaalam muzhuvathum varuvenae
Unthan paathaiyil bayamillai
Nee vaa
Malayai sumakira balam unakku
Malarai rasikira manam unakku
Inimael eppothum nee enakku
Nee vaa

Un thunai thaedi naan vanthen
Thurathathae da
Un kobam kuda naan nindru
Rasithenae da

Nee theeyai iru ennai thiriyai thodu
Naan oli petrae vaazhvaenae da
Adai ennai thavira ela peyarum aanai aanaiyo
Naan unaku matum sontham endrum ena aanalum
Nee illai endru soli vidu da

Erimalai kangal rendu
Panimalai ithayam ondru
Unnidam kanden keta payyaa
Boomiyil ambalai endru
Unnai than solven indru
Ver ena solla ketta payyaa

Unnalae atcham indri naan vaazhuren
Un kita atcha patu en saaguren
Intha boomi pandai thaandi poga mudyathu da
Un arugil nindral manam kuda nerungaathu da
En nilavaram unaku puriya vilayyaa?
Ohooo ohooo ohooo

lyrics.name: Vaa Vaathi
lyrics.lyrics:
Oru thala kaadhala thandha
Indha tharudhala manasukulla vandha
Oru thala kaadhala thandha
Indha tharudhala manasukulla vandha

Solli thara vaa vaathi
Serthu vacha aasai ellaam
Alli thara vaa vaathi
En usura un usuraa
Thaaren kai maathi

Unnala naan failu
Pudikaama ootunen realu
Inimel naan un aalu} (2)

Ey ley ley eloo

Pocketil un hero pena
Aanean naan

Aanean naan

Oora suthanum

Unnala naan failu
Pudikaama ootinen realu
Inimel naan un aalu} (2)

Oru thala kaadhala thandha

Oru thala kaadhala thandha
